entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kaladar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:08 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 10:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: E 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Snow mixed with ice pellets late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers and flurries late this evening then to a few flurries before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
